display_name: Filtered: Overall Supine RDI at 4% desat
description: Supine RDI at 4% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position associated with >= 4% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hrembp4 + hnrbp4 + carbp4 + canbp4 + oarbp4 + oanbp4 + marbp4 + manrbp4)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
